title: SheltonTheater Curtain
text: The design studio worked with a number of important architects and space designers, including I. M. Pei, Louis Kahn, and the firm Skidmore, Owings and Merrill. The studioâ€™s work with architect Edward Larrabee Barnes began with a project for Pan American Airlines and later included the creation of this auditorium curtain for the Christian Theological seminary in Indianapolis.
description: Plain weave with supplimentary weft and warp of 4 yarns forming 3/4 \" squares.  Pattern repeat 6\" horizontal by 6 1/2 \" vertical, hemmed at both ends. Plain weave with supplimentary weft and warp of 4 yarns forming 3/4 \" squares.  Pattern repeat 6\" horizontal by 6 1/2 \" vertical, hemmed at both ends. (Red/Orange)
